meanings.definition: In a way that is relevant or applicable to a particular matter.
meanings.sent1: She answered the question pertinently during the interview.
meanings.sent2: He always speaks pertinently during our meetings.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed pertinently when asked about dinner time.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was pertinently like a compass guiding us in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation was pertinently clear and easy to understand.

meanings.definition: In a way that is directly related to the topic being discussed.
meanings.sent1: The speaker addressed the audience pertinently on the current issue.
meanings.sent2: The article pertinently highlighted the main points of the research.
meanings.sent3: The joke pertinently made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: His words were pertinently a spotlight on the truth of the matter.
meanings.sent5: The map guided us pertinently through the winding forest paths.
